transcript:
Customer: [unintelligible]

Executive: Hello. Ha Rajan ji good afternoon.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Imran baat kar raha tha main senior manager India Mart se sir.
Customer: Hello. 
Executive: Haan ji sir kal baat hui thi sir aapse maine tax invoice bhi aapko share karwa diya tha sir over the whatsapp hai na sir abhi koi doubt hai koi issue hai sir bataiye sir.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Mere ko koi problem nahi hai.
Executive: Theek hai agar aapko koi issue nahi hai sir to aapka jo feedback aaya tha sir jiske regarding ye concern open hua tha agar aapka permission ho.
Customer: Payment deposit karta hu tumhare side mein.
Executive: Kya kar rahe ho aap?
Customer: Payment deposit karta hu.
Executive: Sorry sir samjha nahi main kya keh rahe the aap.
Customer: Hum deposit kiya na payment.
Executive: Haan to wo to maine aapko tax invoice bhijwa diya tha sir theek hai na aap I hope aapne check bhi kar liya hoga hai na sir.
Customer: Sir main bolta hu main deposit kiya na payment wo karte nahi karo main January ko main payment karta hu main aisa bolta hai.
Executive: January ko payment karta hu to aapne to sir renewal to sir October mein karwaya tha na hamare yahan pe.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Renewal to already aapka ho gaya hai sir.
Customer: Sir mera renewal date January hai sir.
Executive: Haan haan January hi rahega sir maine to bataya sir ki aapne jaise payment proceed kiya na to aapne pre involve apna matlab expiry date se pehle aapne apna renewal process karwaya tha theek hai aur abhi jo aapka service hamara hamara renewal date January 26 main 25 ko tumhare payment tumhare company mein payment deposit karta hu hamara problem same.
Executive: Theek hai bilkul sir bilkul aapka January mein aapne 9th January 2025 se aapki services sir India Mart ki live hui thi theek hai na aur abhi aapne sir same service ka jo renewal process kiya tha wo October mahine mein kiya tha theek hai sir abhi pichle mahine aapne mera problem nahi hai tumhara side ka tumhara employee ka issue hai.
Executive: Kya issue hai sir bataiye.
Customer: Tumhara employee mere ko fake information diya tha isliye hamara problem.
Executive: Kya fake information diya tha sir bataiye na sir.
Customer: Sir hamara renewal date koi aadmi ko nahi bola tha.
Executive: Kya bataya jata aapko?
Customer: Sir hamara renewal date 20 January ko tumhare side mein information nahi diya tha isliye hum.
Executive: Achcha matlab wo expiry date aapka kab ho raha hai wo aapko team ne bataya nahi tha na sir.
Customer: Ha yes wo koi mail nahi hai koi whatsapp mail message nahi hai koi bhi nahi hai.
Executive: Achcha achcha chaliye sir is cheez ko main escalate karunga sir iske liye aap nishchit rahiye theek hai baki aap nishchit rahiye sir agar aapne apna pehle bhi renewal karaya hai na to aapka jo bhi time bacha hai na sir wo time aapka add ho gaya hai sir aur next jo aapka renewal date hai na sir wo 8 January 2027 ka hai sir uske liye aap nishchit rahiye sir aapka services mein sir kisi bhi tarah ka ya time duration mein kisi bhi tarah ka koi impact aapka nahi padega sir theek hai next time aap jab renewal karaiyega aapka to aap apna 8 January 2027 ko hi aapko karana hai usse pehle aapko nahi karana hai sir theek hai sir abhi koi doubt hai sir aap boliyega to main aapko mere ko koi doubt mere ko koi doubt nahi hai mere ko tumhare service malum hai but hamara problem only sahi mein main samajh gaya sir aap samajh gaya sir main samajh gaya side mein galat information humko diya.
Executive: Achcha might bhi sir wo renewal aapka generate hoga hoga na to renewal generation ke vajah se aapko bataya ho gaya ki aapka October mein sir renewal generate hua tha aur hamara kya hota hai sir ki jab bhi koi kisi bhi client ka renewal generate hota hai na sir to jo bhi best possible offer hota hai na sir company usko provide karti hai sir hai na to is vajah se sir aapne jaise 32000 plus GST ka amount bhi pay kiya tha hai na sir abhi aap check karoge na hamare corporate mein sir to same service ka cost sir annual jo price hai na wo 35 plus GST ka hai sir but aapko hum logo ne 32 plus GST ka aapko offer kiya tha wo aapka renewal jaise generate hota hai sir to renewal ke vajah se sir jo bhi best possible deal hota hai sir company offer karti hai sir theek hai baki aapka service aisa nahi hai ki aapne pehle kara liya to bacha hua time aapka sir usme koi impact padega aisa kuch nahi hoga jo aapka time bacha hua hai sir wo aapka add ho jayega theek hai baki maine tax invoice vagaira dono aapko over the whatsapp maine aapko share karwa diya tha agar aapko return mein chahiye to main return mein aapke registered mail id pe na aapka last expiry date vagaira sari cheeze main aapko over the whatsapp ya fir aapko over the mail aapko main share bhi karwa de raha hu theek hai.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: [unintelligible]
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer says employee gave fake information.

- Renewal date information not provided by IndiaMART.



Resolution:

- Executive will escalate the issue.

- Confirmed remaining time will be added to renewal.

- Next renewal date is January 8, 2027.

- Tax invoice shared over WhatsApp and email.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- renewal, tax invoice, expiry date, payment
